name: PLZ run high
description:
A challenging aim training center made in a week for a school project.

How fast can you defeat the tower considering that :

-Red is shoot.

-Sphere are score.

-Tetrahedron are boost.

Musique : Gaston Larrouy

https://larouille1.bandcamp.com/

I hope you'll enjoy it ! Feel free to give your feedback and post screenshot of your time.
